name: Go with the Flow (exopunk, Kaminos, Nectanebo, Mous)
name_original: Go with the Flow (exopunk, Kaminos, Nectanebo, Mous)
description:
Embrace the flow in this fast action platformer and try to survive as long as you can.

Please share your best score and time in the comments :)

Keyboard controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to move

Space to jump

hold Space to jump higher

E or X to interact

ESC to pause

Controller:

D-pad,  Left Thumbstick to move

XB A, PS Cross to jump

XB X, PS Square to interact

 XB Start, PS Options/Start to pause


Issues:

The web version might have some issues on some browsers, please download the desktop version or try another browser.

Team:

Alex Kaminaris - Art

Vasilis  Kaminaris - Art

Alex Podaras - Programming

Theodore Moustakas - Sound design / Music

Attributions:

Luckiest Guy font by Astigmatic
Dogica font by Roberto Mocci
